remarks: A "diagonal commutation" of divisor sums analogous to ~ fsum0diag . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jul-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Apr-2016.)
statement:
fsumdvdsdiag.1 $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
fsumdvdsdiaglem $p |- ( ph -> ( ( j e. { x e. NN | x || N } /\ k e. { x e. NN | x || ( N / j ) } ) -> ( k e. { x e. NN | x || N } /\ j e. { x e. NN | x || ( N / k ) } ) ) ) $.
$d N j k x $.
$d j k ph $.
